Player History
Injured on 5/8/2003 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Philadelphia on 3/2/2006...
Drafted in 5th round, 128th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2012...
Injured on 4/22/2019 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1977...
Injured on 9/2/1978 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/9/1980 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1981, off Ed Acosta (CAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1981, off Rick Wise (NYY)...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1981, hitting .393 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1981, hitting .297 with 9 HR, 84 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/20/1982 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cleveland on 8/12/1983...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1983...
Injured on 9/6/1984 with a Broken Hand, out for 7 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Cleveland on 6/27/1986...
Injured on 7/29/1986 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/6/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/28/1990 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 11 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1991...
Traded from New York (N) to Texas on 2/5/1992 (Going to NYM: CF L. Dykstra, P M. Jackson. Going to TEX: CF M. Wilson, P W. Alvarez)...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 4/24/1992...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1992, hitting .342 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/18/1992, off Steve Ontiveros (NYY)...
